name: Wall of Man
flavorText: Named for the Battle of Josqueira, a conflict so long and fierce that men used the skeletons of their fallen comrades to build fortifications.
flavorTextHtml: Named for the Battle of Josqueira, a conflict so long and fierce that men used the skeletons of their fallen comrades to build fortifications.

secondary.textHtml: [20 - 30]% chance to be protected by a shield of bones when you are hit.
secondary.text: [20 - 30]% chance to be protected by a shield of bones when you are hit.
